values:
Man, that heatwave was crazy, even for me.

Bob, I've got something I wanted to ask you about.

I missed the free booze and now it's raining like hell.

I have nothing to say but "D:".

Hey Xaldy? Last night, I finished a bunch of paperwork and left it on your desk for you to go over. Funny thing, though. That light you had on your desk? It short-circuited and that really expensive paperweight you had caught on fire. I saved the papers, but I don't know what happened. Had to trash both of them.

Sorry, man. But hey, at least all my hard work didn't go to waste, right?

Divamyx.

Don't make me come over there.

I got some cookies. Soft cookies taken out of the oven and left to cool at just the right moment so that they're chewy. And they had M&Ms in them, even. 

Those cookies were pretty sweet, if I say so myself.

HATE SNOW COLD THINGS RAGE WHAT THE FUCK ICYNESS SNOW OF ALL THINGS WHY INTENSE DISLIKE ARGH.

...

Also, brrrr.

Where's the nearest bonfire?

Since our room has been nicely reorganized, I stepped out for a mission for justice. Now, the littlest member of Team 6 has been cleaned and restored to his proper state. The room is now complete. Party on, folks. ((OOC: Credit for the manip goes to the lovely Kiara! XD))

What the...

Way to kill my good mood.

DIBS ON THE SNAIL!

DEMYX.

Roxas doesn't think he's squishy. Help me prove him wrong.

When I moved into my house, it had these really tacky curtains. I hated 'em for so long, 'cause they were just that offensively ugly. But I didn't go and replace 'em, because they were perfectly fine curtains if you ignored the fact that they looked like ass.

They caught on fire last night. Heh. It was pretty funny.

Guess I gotta buy myself some new curtains.

To fight, or not to fight? That is the question.

Wonder if I'll have the time to join a tournament.
